analysis.description:
UniDAGCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x21227522fe4b785c51af1fba8b39c042335bd49c.sol#231-234) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x21227522fe4b785c51af1fba8b39c042335bd49c.sol#233)

UniDAGCrowdsale._getTokenAmount (/unique_chucks/11/0x21227522fe4b785c51af1fba8b39c042335bd49c.sol#235-241) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < thirdRoundTime (/unique_chucks/11/0x21227522fe4b785c51af1fba8b39c042335bd49c.sol)
	- block.timestamp < secondRoundTime (/unique_chucks/11/0x21227522fe4b785c51af1fba8b39c042335bd49c.sol#238-241)

UniDAGCrowdsale.closingTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0x21227522fe4b785c51af1fba8b39c042335bd49c.sol#198)
UniDAGCrowdsale.openingTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0x21227522fe4b785c51af1fba8b39c042335bd49c.sol#191-192)
UniDAGCrowdsale.rateFirstRound should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0x21227522fe4b785c51af1fba8b39c042335bd49c.sol#186-188)
